title: #Rambukkana Shooting : impartial & transparent inquiry will be carried out, tweets President
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has said that Sri Lanka Police will carry out an impartial & transparent inquiry into the incident at Rambukkana.
In a tweet the President said that Sri Lankan citizens’ right to peacefully protest won’t be hindered.
The President further urged all citizens to refrain from violence as they protest.
